object.name: OwnedGiftUnique
object.description: Describes a unique gift received and owned by a user or a chat.
object.html_description: Describes a unique gift received and owned by a user or a chat.
object.rst_description: Describes a unique gift received and owned by a user or a chat.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the received gift for the bot; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.html_description: Optional. Unique identifier of the received gift for the bot; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Unique identifier of the received gift for the bot; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.name: owned_gift_id

annotations.description: Sender of the gift if it is a known user
annotations.html_description: Optional. Sender of the gift if it is a known user
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Sender of the gift if it is a known user
annotations.name: sender_user

annotations.description: Date the gift was sent in Unix time
annotations.html_description: Date the gift was sent in Unix time
annotations.rst_description: Date the gift was sent in Unix time
annotations.name: send_date

annotations.description: True, if the gift is displayed on the account's profile page; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the gift is displayed on the account's profile page; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the gift is displayed on the account's profile page; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.name: is_saved

annotations.description: True, if the gift can be transferred to another owner; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the gift can be transferred to another owner; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the gift can be transferred to another owner; for gifts received on behalf of business accounts only
annotations.name: can_be_transferred

annotations.description: Number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to transfer the gift; omitted if the bot cannot transfer the gift
annotations.html_description: Optional. Number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to transfer the gift; omitted if the bot cannot transfer the gift
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to transfer the gift; omitted if the bot cannot transfer the gift
annotations.name: transfer_star_count

annotations.description: Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the gift can be transferred. If it is in the past, then the gift can be transferred now
annotations.html_description: Optional. Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the gift can be transferred. If it is in the past, then the gift can be transferred now
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Point in time (Unix timestamp) when the gift can be transferred. If it is in the past, then the gift can be transferred now
annotations.name: next_transfer_date
